_meanings:
{@--2@} To
enjoy, taste; {#paya upayujya#} <ls>Me. 13</ls>
<ab>v. l.</ab>; {#PalAnyupAyuMkta sa daMqanIteH#}  
<ls>R. 18. 46</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 39.</ls>

{@--3@} To devote or
attach oneself to; {#na mfgErupayujyate#} is
not loved <ls>Pt. 2. 22</ls>; {#na vE prAjYA#} 
{#gataSrIkaM BartAramupayuMjate#} <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>

{@--4@} To
yoke or harness (as horses to a
carriage).
